title: Robert Mumpkin Myer and the Wish Makers
description: Wishes make worlds.Robert Mumpkin Myer talks to himself, a lot. If someone at the Myer Manor would bother talking back, perhaps he wouldnâ€™t be so lonely. Even his pet rabbit, Mike, falls asleep to pass time. When a Willie Wagtail lures him up a tree, Robert is transported to a parallel universe, where nothing is what it seems, and his ordinary life becomes 'down the rabbit hole' extraordinary. Will Robert return unchanged, or will he find the magic laying dormant in his heart since birth?
author: Hayley Merelle
